attributes.action: David Cameron should resign with immediate effect due to gross negligence with regard to the crisis in Syria
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron's failure to condemn the massacre's in Gaza and his unconditional support for a morally bankrupt regime in the state of Israel, leaves Great Britain's position  as a world leader in foreign relations untenable.                                                                 As our leader and representative on the world stage David Cameron is responsible for acting on behalf of us, the british people. His failure to do this and his defiant choice to protect his own interests amounts to gross negligence and it is now up to us to demand his resignation from the post of Prime Minister.
